title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Improving Technical Problem-Solving Skills Through Design Activities: Experimental Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of technical education and digital tool usage (smartphone-level proficiency)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can sketch at least three design solutions by hand for a given social issue
Learners can compare differences in the design process based on the use or non-use of CAD tools
Learners can apply creative problem-solving strategies in design activities using digital/analog tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
